parameters.jsCode:
const body = $input.first().json.body || $input.first().json || {};
return [{ json: { channel_id: body.channel_id, proposed_colors: body.proposed_colors, proposed_avatar: body.proposed_avatar, action: body.action || 'audit', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }];

parameters.query: SELECT channel_id, primary_color_hsl, secondary_color_hsl, avatar_style, avatar_hash, color_space_hash FROM channel_visual_dna WHERE channel_id != $1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100
